mapper.select: SELECT rno, txtno, mid, title, rnum, category, mtxt, cdate, count FROM (SELECT ROWNUM rno, txtno, mid, title, rnum, category, mtxt, TO_CHAR(cdate,'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss') cdate, count FROM txt t, category c WHERE isshow = 'Y' AND t.catno=c.catno ORDER BY txtno DESC )
SELECT txtno, title, mtxt, mid, cdate, count, catno, upno, (SELECT count(*) FROM recommend WHERE isrec='Y' AND txtno=#{txtno}) rnum FROM txt WHERE txtno = #{txtno} AND isshow='Y'
SELECT txtno, mtxt, upno, mid, TO_CHAR(cdate,'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss') cdate FROM txt WHERE upno is not null AND upno = #{txtno} AND isshow = 'Y' ORDER BY cdate desc
mapper.update: UPDATE txt SET isshow = 'N' WHERE txtno = #{txtno} AND upno =#{upno}
mapper.select: SELECT count(*) FROM recommend WHERE mid = #{mid} AND txtno = #{txtno}
